caption.p: Histograms of relative abundance of the top 10 bacteria at the phyla level of taxonomy ( a), and significantly different species in the sample ( b). Description: Ordinate is the relative abundance of bacteria phyla; others refers to are sequences with less or not be annotated; abscissa is the group name (E, R and S: years 1, 2, and 3, respectively; W, G and D: Glycyrrhiza uralensis, Glycyrrhiza glabra, and Glycyrrhiza inflata, respectively). The mark * is significance test p < 0.05.
